nodes.text: The Vivab deserts were ice-swept plains located on the Clar. By the year 2 ABY, they had been explored and charted by Barosa Warren and Casti Tholon.

The Vivab deserts were first mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a Star Wars Legends supplement written by Craig Robert Carey, J. P. Pietrzak, Bill Smith, and Trevor J. Wilson for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and released on June 1, 1995.
